Original: 這個地方太棒了。很棒的共鳴。裝飾很棒。飲料很美味，物有所值，強！ （非常好）。推薦樹須。食物很美味。鮪魚塔塔基值得一吃。週六 9:30，DJ 拿起混音器，播放 2010 年代的酷炫歌曲。這是一個美好的夜晚，令人難忘。如果我在台灣，我一定會來這裡。

Original:
內裝非常時尚，也是最好的。最重要的是，我很高興台灣有一些異常濃鬱的雞尾酒。披薩自助餐提供多種不同類型的披薩，每種都非常美味。
他們會說英語，老闆也會說日語。
EN:
The interior is very fashionable and the best.The most important thing is that I am very happy that there are some unusually rich cocktails in Taiwan.Pizza buffet offers a variety of different types of pizza, each of which is very delicious.
They speak English, and the boss can speak Japanese.

Original: 我非常喜歡這個地方。這是一家獨特時尚的地下室酒吧和餐廳，供應美味的原創菜餚，烹飪完美。伴隨著美妙的氣氛和美妙的音樂。也要向雷克薩斯大聲喊叫，他無疑是我見過的最好、最友善、最有趣、最迷人的服務生。我已經去過三次了，迫不及待想再去一次。我在台北最喜歡的地方。
EN: I like this place very much.This is a unique and stylish basement bar and restaurant, which supplies delicious original dishes and has a perfect cooking.Accompanied by a wonderful atmosphere and wonderful music.He also shouted to Lexus, he is undoubtedly the best, most friendly, most interesting, and most charming waiter I have ever seen.I have been there three times, and I can't wait to go again.I am the favorite place in Taipei.

Original: 這家基隆最受歡迎的台北分店提供美味的食物和優質的服務。強烈推薦。在草稿上重新指出。
EN: This Keelung's most popular Taipei branch provides delicious food and high -quality services.Strongly recommended.Re -point on the draft.

Original: 主人非常樂於助人和友善。我希望我能待更長的時間來享受這個地方的酒吧和氛圍。只是有點貴，但光是飲料就值得了。
EN: The owner is very happy and friendly.I hope I can enjoy the bar and atmosphere of this place for a longer time.It's just a bit expensive, but drinking alone is worth it.

Original: 我很高興壞媽媽在台北！業主用在台灣海岸發現的物品建造了這個地方，並將其變成了皇冠上的寶石！這很奇怪。這很時髦。很新鮮。我喜歡它！前幾天我吃的食物從爆米花魚到起司盤都很特別。還有飲料！我能感覺到注入的內格羅尼酒穿過我的身體直達我的靈魂。 《壞媽媽》的一切都令人難以置信
EN: I am very happy that the bad mother is in Taipei!The owner used the items found by the Taiwan Coast to build this place and turned it into a crown gem!This is strange.This is fashionable.Very fresh.I like it!A few days ago, the food I ate was very special from popcorn fish to cheese.There are drinks!I can feel the injection of Negranini through my body to reach my soul.Everything in "Bad Mom" ​​is incredible
